title: No Pizza in this Fking game
body: Why is there no pizza in this game?  Have you ever stopped to consider Riot how dumb this is.

replies.body:
We have considered the lack of pizza in LoL, multiple times. Each time our conclusion was 'we should go eat pizza'.

Back in a bit, going to eat pizza.
Pizza Delivery Sivir would solve these problems.

you mean like this?

http://41.media.tumblr.com/b7d46e58c89eacdae176c982dda20ab4/tumblr_nhiweiks2P1rgdio9o1_1280.png
THE ORDER IS GIVEN
http://pm1.narvii.com/5784/fac18b8a3c7906e70dc8dcf164933b6eabda66bd_hq.jpg
Please can we have a fast food chain of champ skins? Griddlesticks (Fiddlesticks) as a grill boy, Cashier Azir, Delivery Girl Sivir, Biggie-Sized Gragas, and Baconivia (Anivia).
Needs more puns. Cashzir, Desiviry Girl, McGragas
Gragas Grande (Mexican Food Gragas).
and Mc{{champion:35}}
Mash and Graves.
there is so much potential for food skins. {{champion:80}} wants to be a baker, {{champion:15}} could deliver pizzas around and {{champion:268}} THE ORDER IS GIVEN!

WHY IS THIS NOT A THING!?
CAN SHE PLEASE THROW A PIZZA!? PLEASE LET HER THROW A PIZZA. I WANT TO THROW A PIZZA AT MY ENEMIES.
God I want these skins to be real.

{{champion:80}} I JUST WANNA BAKE!

In before 420 comments.

Well you have to get high as a kite before landing his ult.

Sorry I had to.

Huh. Maybe you guys could make a skin for Delivery someone... maybe Braum, or Sivir, or...

Brb going out for pizza

At 3:30

Do I hear a Delivery Braum skin? Q fires Pizza and ult tears up crust with cheese around it.
{{champion:82}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:77}} Don't worry, we have plenty of pizza!
I fail to believe Pantheon's so called pizza feet exist. Look at them, They aren't even there.

what a god
Play Taric or Mordekaiser. They got some nice pizza feet.
{{champion:82}} Pizza feet is numero uno.

Box of pizza - upgrades from flask

Has 8 charges, each charge restores 15% of missing HP and mana for target ally (it's supporty).  10 second CD.  Refills at base.  Takes up a trinket slot.
Sounds... OPizza.

Has 8 charges, each charge deteriorates 5% HP and MP (clogged arteries).  If used by support, it reduces HP and MP for both support and adc.  If used by Soraka or Sona, then all teammates impacted by "heal" incur a loss of both stats as well.  No CD - eat as much as you want (until you run out of stats).
There was pizza in the game, but then they updated TF and Sivir.
This made me laugh way harder than it should have.
http://new4.fjcdn.com/comments/So+you+re+pizza+the+hut+_69c5703ea6532161ca143efe60eb53d3.jpg
PIZZA THE HUT!

The thing is, I would totally play as a slice of pizza. Or we could have a Pizza Zac skin. He can either look like a pizza, or be dressed as a pizza delivery guy. When he dies his globs are slices of pizza.
{{champion:82}} {{champion:44}}
Yes.
Servers are in Chicago now. Best you can even hope for is tomato soup in a breadbowl.
upvoted
It's because {{champion:80}} didn't become a baker.

Actually, There is Pizza! Look very carefully in the hole and you can see a sewer with a Pizza and two Syes (not sure how to spell.) 

https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&ved=0CAcQjRxqFQoTCJC_7fGR_8cCFcrNgAodrj8Gdg&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2Fr%2Fleagueoflegends%2Fcomments%2F34m8et%2Fthere_is_a_cave_with_a_hidden_sword_in_bottom%2F&psig=AFQjCNFE6ricjoITAy7KFRD_4blLk4DnMQ&ust=1442616067355605
What are you talking about? There's PLENTY of pizza in this game... Just ask Taric and Mordekaiser.
I expected this thread to be complaining about the lack of a /pizza command. Can't tell if I'm disappointed it's not.
There actually is a hidden slice of pizza in Summoner's Rift...  So actually yes, this game does in fact have pizza.

zoom in on blue side bottom lane and have a look around. 

i think you'll find there is more pizza in league then you think.
TF needs to be a part of the pizza delivery team
What about Taric's pizza feet?
Where is my Delivery Girl Sivir? Replace her chakram with a pizza and there you go! Hell, when she ults, she should yell "UNDER 30 MINUTES OR IT'S FREE!"
